text: Three Plus Two () is a 1963 Soviet comedy movie directed by Genrikh Oganisyan.«Ретрочетверги» советского кино начинаются в Казанском паркеТРИ ПЛЮС ДВА (1963) It stars Natalya Kustinskaya, Natalya Fateyeva, and Andrei Mironov. ==Actors== * Natalya Kustinskaya as Natasha, a film actress. * Natalya Fateyeva as Zarema "Zoya" Pavlovna. * Andrei Mironov as Roman Lyubeshkin, veterinarian. * Evgeny Zharikov as Vadim, an English speaking diplomat. * Gennadi Nilov as Stepan Ivanovich Sundukov, Doctor of Physics and Mathematics. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1963 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Three Plus Two
